title: 1deval
description: Evaluates an expression that may include columns of data from one or more text files and writes the result to stdout.

del.title: Step for undetermined variable
del.description: Use 'd' as the step for a single undetermined variable in the expression.

start.title: Start value
start.description: Start at value 's' for a single undetermined variable in the expression.

index.title: Index column file
index.description: Read index column from file i.1D and write it out as 1st column of output.

1D.title: 1D formatted output
1D.description: Write output in the form of a single '1D:' string suitable for input on the command line of another program.

symbols.title: Symbols assignment
symbols.description: Read time series file and assign it to the symbol 'a'. Letters 'a' to 'z' may be used as symbols.

symbol_values.title: Symbols fixed values
symbol_values.description: Assign a fixed numerical value to the symbol 'a'. Letters 'a' to 'z' may be used as symbols.
